message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product for sale! It's worth at least $150 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $200.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only afford $130 right now. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  $130 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $160. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Alice, I understand your position, but $160 is still a bit more than I can comfortably spend.  How about we split the difference and settle on $145? I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.
